description: Leo Varadkar says Phase One of the plan to lift the Covid-19 lockdown will begin on Monday.
title: Coronavirus: Face coverings advised as Ireland eases restrictions
title_page: Coronavirus: Face coverings advised as Ireland eases restrictions - BBC News
maintext: "Covid-19 is an inferno that is raging around the world. In Ireland it is a fire in retreat but it will not be defeated if we do not distinguish every spark and quench every ember.
